data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Necaxa.
In Monterrey Monterrey drive forward through Vincent Janssen. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Monterrey.
Can Necaxa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monterrey's half?
In the minute 9, Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Free kick Necaxa.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 11, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Monterrey.
Monterrey's Vincent Janssen gets in a shot on goal at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Monterrey throw-in in Necaxa's half.
In the minute 14, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured David Cabrera.
Necaxaâ€™s David Cabrera is on his feet again at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
In the minute 16, Unai Bilbao (Necaxa) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 29, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Passerini gets his shot on target but fails to score for Necaxa.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Ricardo Chavez (Necaxa) gets a yellow card.
Necaxa attack but Lucas Passerini's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
In the minute 35, Jesus Gallardo (Monterrey) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a throw-in for Monterrey, close to Necaxa's area.
In the minute 36, Monterrey's Jesus Gallardo is on target but unsuccessful.
Angel Malagon is back on the pitch.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Necaxa needs to be cautious. Monterrey have an attacking throw-in.
The match at Estadio BBVA Bancomer has been interrupted briefly for a check on Angel Malagon, who is down injured.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Monterrey throw-in in Necaxa's half.
In the minute 39, Monterrey have a dangerous throw-in.
Monterrey drives forward and Rogelio Funes Mori gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Monterrey's Aviles Hurtado misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In the minute 43, Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Monterrey pushes forward through Vincent Janssen, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 44, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Necaxa.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Rogelio Funes Mori for Monterrey drives towards goal at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Monterrey drive upfield and Carlos Rodriguez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Monterrey.
Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Necaxa.
The first-half has come to a close in Monterrey.
Nicolas Sanchez (Monterrey) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, Eduardo Galvan Basulto has blown to start the second-half.
Dorlan Pabon is replacing Aviles Hurtado for the home team.
Alex Zendejas is on a sub for Joao Rodriguez for Necaxa.
In the minute 48, Can Monterrey capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Juan Delgado (Necaxa) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in Necaxa.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Monterrey are pushing forward but Dorlan Pabon's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
Necaxa push forward at Estadio BBVA Bancomer and Lucas Passerini gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Monterrey defence.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
In the minute 53, Unai Bilbao of Necaxa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Monterrey close to the penalty box.
Monterrey's Carlos Rodriguez breaks free at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 55, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Monterrey's Vincent Janssen gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Goal! Dorlan Pabon gives Monterrey a 1-0 lead in Monterrey.
Carlos Rodriguez with an assist there.
In the minute 60, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Monterrey a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dorlan Pabon of Monterrey smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 65, Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 66, In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luis Alfonso Sosa (Necaxa) is making a second substitution, with Maximiliano Salas replacing Fernando Arce.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Rogelio Funes Mori of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 68, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Vincent Janssen with Miguel Layun.
In the minute 69, Necaxa to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Monterrey throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Necaxa a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
Free kick Necaxa.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa.
In the minute 76, Unai Bilbao scores with his head for Necaxa to level the match at 1-1.
Great play from David Cabrera to set up the goal.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Necaxa throw-in in Monterrey's half.
In the minute 79, Martin Barragan is replacing Lucas Passerini for Necaxa at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Antonio Mohamed is making the team's third substitution at Estadio BBVA Bancomer with Jose Alvarado replacing Matias Kranevitter.
Free kick Monterrey.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Monterrey.
Jesus Gallardo (Monterrey) has received a yellow card from Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Juan Delgado for Necaxa who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Necaxa's Juan Delgado is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 85, Rogelio Funes Mori (Monterrey) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Necaxa pushes forward through Juan Delgado, whose finish on goal is saved.
Alex Zendejas (Necaxa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 86, Ian Gonzalez (Necaxa) has replaced the possibly injured Juan Delgado at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 87, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Monterrey make their fifth substitution with Arturo Gonzalez replacing Carlos Rodriguez.
The home team have replaced Celso Ortiz with Jonathan Gonzalez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Monterrey.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Monterrey Monterrey drive forward through Stefan Medina. His shot is on target but it's saved.
David Cabrera for Necaxa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Monterrey are in shooting range from this free kick.
Arturo Gonzalez for Monterrey drives towards goal at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Necaxa.
Throw-in high up the field for Necaxa in Monterrey.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
